name: Shooting Star
content: Hold me close and don't let go
Moving mountains is hard I know
You chose to leave and I chose to cry
You left me with the stars
I am in love with a shooting star
I am in love with a shooting star
This girl I know she used to cry
The pain she felt came to no surprise
She was aware of her choice in life
I am in love with a shooting star
I am in love with a shooting star
